article.headline: Eagles manage to stay undefeated
article.linkText: Holy Cross loses to Boston College in OT
article.story: BOSTON (AP) -- Jared Dudley scored six points and grabbed a key rebound in overtime, helping Boston College pull out a 63-60 overtime win over Holy Cross on Thursday night. Craig Smith led the Eagles (6-0) with 21 points and 10 rebounds. Jermaine Watson added 15 points and nine rebounds for BC, and Dudley finished with nine points. Nate Lufkin led the Crusaders (4-3) with 12 points. John Hurley and Kevin Hyland had 11 points apiece. After Lufkin's two free throws gave Holy Cross a 57-55 lead, Steve Hailey tied it with two free throws. Hailey then sank a jumper over the edge of the backboard as the shot clock expired with 1:49 to play in overtime. Kevin Hamilton missed a jumper for the Crusaders and Dudley grabbed the rebound and was fouled. He hit both free throws with 28 seconds left and sank two more with 5 seconds remaining. Dudley's basket with 2:02 to play in regulation moved BC ahead 53-51, but he missed a free throw that would have converted a 3-point play. The Crusaders tied it on Hyland's put-back with 1:39 left.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
